data.text: Yahweh says, “You people who desire to act righteously/justly,
Think about your ancestor Abraham and his wife Sarah, of whom all of you are descendants.
Some day I, Yahweh, will encourage his descendants again,
My people of Judah, listen carefully [DOU] to me,
I will soon/quickly rescue you [DOU];
Look up at the sky,
You people who know what things are right to do,
because some day they will be destroyed
Yahweh, wake up and do something for us!
Surely you are [RHQ] the one who caused the Red Sea to become dry
And those whom Yahweh will rescue from being exiled in Babylonia
Yahweh says,
◄Why have you/You should not have► [RHQ] forgotten me, Yahweh, the one who created your nation,
Soon you people who have been caused to be slaves in Babylonia will be freed!
because I am Yahweh, your God,
I have given you my message [MTY] to proclaim,
You people of [APO] Jerusalem, wake up [DOU]!
Now you do not have any children who are alive [DOU]
You have experienced several disasters:
Your children have fainted and lie in the streets;
So now, you people who have suffered much,
Yahweh, your Lord and your God,
Instead, I will cause those who have tormented you to suffer;
